answers.answer: Hey Joy & Everyone!!See my post about 24 hour urine test.. That's what's up for me today. Uggh..On a side note, (Joy) can you send me a link for jewelry website via PM? I would love to check it out. Thanks and have fun cleaning!

Just waiting on my weekly call from my Mom and Gma!  lol  ...Tho, my two uncles and their wives are in town visiting my Gma, so I don't know if my mom will still be going over there for their weekly outings (dr's appts, grocery shopping, etc).  I'll just have to wait and see!Otherwise, I'm just sitting here catching up on all my message boards and blogs.  I feel like I haven't had time for any of it!!  Also, I got some great news from my doctor on Monday ...I don't have gestational diabetes!!  Yay!!  =D  Also, she said the measurements from the ultrasound looked great.  =D  Little Jaiden is growing very well (he even has a big "pumpkin head", as DH and I have so teasingly nicknamed it).  =DLastly, I've been deliberating what to do about my baby shower (see my other post).  I don't have much time left for one, and don't want to wait till the last minute!!Anyway, I hope everyone's week is going great!  Two more days and it'll be the weekend!!  Yay!!
Sure, Laura! Having a giveaway this next week, too.I'm about to check out your baby shower post, Avanaar!!!

Slightly crazy day at work today, since our 8th graders have a field trip to a vo. tech. school, so our periods got all switched around.  I had them right before they left, and man were they wound up!!  My 7th graders are doing better though, since I'm actually able to type this while they're working on a project!
bluegenie, that's HILARIOUS! All those times we were working on projects in school... I wonder if my teachers were on forums. Seriously cracks me up! I know they checked their emails a lot!

I know!  It kind of cracks me up too, and I'm the one doing it!!!   Being a teacher now though really makes me wonder how many things my teachers did (or didn't do) that we had no idea of at the time!!!It definitely depends on the class though.  This one is really good, so I don't have to be staring over their shoulder all the time.

My husband got a promotion that he started a new vice president position this past monday!!  We FINALLY sold our house and have 60 days to move  into our new one, also got a new car over the weekend!  And other than that, everyone in my house is still sick.  So not really doing anything...Just eager for dinner LOL!

Just got back from the ob because I had a huge glop of cm the other day...no infection and everything is alright.  Got to hear the baby's hb again though =)  My cousin just announced she is 6w pregnant with twins!  No meds or anything and they don't run in our family!  Crazy!  She has a one year old some already so she'll have 3 under two by June!

question: I don't see the post for this today so let's get this rolling!!!What is UP with you guys today?! Anything exciting going on? Any new news?! Promotions? Engagements? New pregnancies?!Today I am a cleaning machine (story of my life) and my oldest is with her Nonna for at least another hour. Working on taking pics for my business and................. that's about it! Pretty dull day. It's raining off and on, too. Really dark outside but LOVING it! I love storms.
title: What's Up Wednesday?!
